title: The Professor's Secret
description: Natasha Carson’s life is perfect. Great job. Perfect boyfriend. But all that changes the moment Adam LaRue steps foot in her classroom. The gorgeous grad student is more than a tattooed temptation – he’s the one person who knows her secret. That beneath her façade of respectability, Natasha pens best-selling BDSM erotica. When Adam makes it clear that one way or another, he’ll have her in his bed, Natasha must ask herself if her life is really as perfect as everyone believes.
author: Katie Devoe
